synopsis.text: Destroyer of the World arrives to disrupt his tranquil existence. Despite his extraordinary bad luck, Komaeda finds contentment in the mundane, believing that an ordinary life, filled with moderate happiness and the joy of watching his classmates experience a normal youth, is the epitome of bliss. However, his world is turned upside down when a mysterious boy, claiming to be the 'Destroyer of the World' and bearing the visage of a red-eyed Hajime Hinata, appears, threatening to shatter his peaceful paradise. As Nagito navigates this strange new world, filled with familiar faces and unknown entities, he must confront the enigmatic force that seeks to destroy all that he holds dear. Will he be able to protect his cherished ordinary life, or will he succumb to the chaos that threatens to consume him? Only time will tell in this thrilling and unpredictable tale of luck, hope, and the power of the human spirit.
